publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-45# Carolyn Leckie: Nursery Nurses—That the Parliament congratulates the nursery nurses who displayed solidarity on the first day of their industrial action; regrets that the nurses have had to resort to such action, and considers that their grading claim should be settled immediately and their professional status recognised.
S2M-45# Nursery Nurses (lodged on 20 May 2003) Frances Curran*

S2M-45# Carolyn Leckie: Nursery Nurses—That the Parliament congratulates the nursery nurses who displayed solidarity on the first day of their industrial action; regrets that the nurses have had to resort to such action, and considers that their grading claim should be settled immediately and their professional status recognised. Supported by: Frances Curran, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-45# Nursery Nurses (lodged on 20 May 2003) Pauline McNeill*
